website_summaries.verdict: Takes our top spot for surpassing its competitors on performance and quality. The best your money can buy.
pros: Has a patented reamer cone that fits all types of citrus fruit
cons: Our testers noted that some of the interior parts are constructed of flimsy plastic

website_summaries.verdict: A great motorized citrus press if you don't need a full juicer.
pros: This is a more powerful option than manual presses and will extract most of the juice
No pulp ends up in the juice, and the machine is easy to clean
cons: Plastic parts on the inside are not very durable

customer_reviews.title: Go commercial instead!
customer_reviews.text: Died after minimal use. Unit would get very hot and not work for a while. Now there is a burned rubber smell. My return window with Amazon is closed, so I will have to deal direct with Breville on repair/replacement. If juicing more than 30 pieces of fruit I would look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: SSJ33

customer_reviews.title: I had to return juicer after only 3 uses because ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to return juicer after only 3 uses because it started overheating and turning off in the middle of my juicing. I would barely juice 1 cup of juice when it would shut off. The $45 juicer I previously used could juice for over an hour and never shut off while this $180 juicer couldn't even juice for 5-10 min.
customer_reviews.author: Bea G.

customer_reviews.title: Lasted one year
customer_reviews.text: I am writing a review exactly one year and a month after this purchase. The juicer doesn't work anymore, period. Warranty is expired so I am stuck with a $180 dollar juicer that won;t do the job. I thought I could rely on a more well known brand, but clearly not. The motor won't start, that is the problem. Very dissappointed.
customer_reviews.author: P.Schmid

customer_reviews.title: this caused me a lot of frustration because when I bought this product I was sure it was one of the best on the market
customer_reviews.text: I am a customer of amazom a long time, I bought this product to bring to Brazil when I arrived and I went to use the device I had the unfortunate surprise that it did not work correctly. this caused me a lot of frustration because when I bought this product I was sure it was one of the best on the market. I need to know how I should proceed since I'm only going to return to the United States in June. if need be I can make a video. thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Tupinambá

customer_reviews.title: Easy & Fast
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this juicer! A few reviews have pointed out problems snapping the juicing cone back into place. We really appreciate those criticisms for the caution they provided. Understanding the potential for error helped make our experience worry & trouble free. Grapefruit, oranges & limes we've juiced enough citrus to discard over 100 gallons of rinds and have juice to carry us through the year. This is in about half the time and with about 25% of the effort of our old electric "hold-fruit-and-push-down-to-operate" juicer.
customer_reviews.author: A. Petersen

customer_reviews.title: I'M ACTUALLY IN LOVE WITH THIS CITRUS PRESS!
customer_reviews.text: The best electric juicer you will ever find! I'm a bit of a Breville snob, I really love Breville products as they are very well thought out and made, easy to clean and they always are beautiful pieces of kitchen artwork! This is one of their best products! Make sure you get model #800CPXL as this is all die cast metal and not plastic. Trust me, you will love it! It is worth the money! I never write reviews and I had to write one about this product! It's amazing!
customer_reviews.author: JOJO E. WOLAK

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and efficient
customer_reviews.text: I love this citrus press because it is efficient, though, and well made. It gives much confidence that most of the parts are made of stainless steel, at least the most important to press the citrus, like the cone, the juice collector, and the sieve. It is super easy to clean. I don't have a washing machine, so I don't know if it is safe to wash the parts there. Weeks ago, I bought an electric juicier from aicok, and the experience was terrible. Now, I have a better appliance to make my juices every day. Go for it, worths the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge F. Reyes-Spindola

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use citrus juicer
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the ease of use of the citrus juicer is simple - except that the juicer cap on the handle falls off very easily making it annoying to use the juicer. The engineering of the juicer cap is poor. There should be a more stable attachment for the cap like a butterfly screw top, but simply a loosely engaged pop-in is cheap design, for what otherwise is a sturdy juicer.
customer_reviews.author: bythebeach

customer_reviews.title: Motor failed after two years
customer_reviews.text: Used daily for about 15-20 fruits. After two years, motor burned out. Was very efficient while it lasted. A few problems: The pivoting arm would jam or loosen, causing dislocation. Fixed by using thread locker. Motor burned out. Fixed by re-purchasing recently. This is the best juicer out there for high volume juicing at home. If you're looking for a commercial model, look elsewhere because this just looks like one.. but it won't perform like one.
customer_reviews.author: S.Z.

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Missing the dust cover and second juice filter. Works great though. Effortless squeezing, quiet. 5 sec to squeeze half an orange. Easy cleaning. Would have rated 5 except for missing parts. Update: 12/17/2017 the spout broke off the juice collector piece surprised at the poor durability after 10 weeks of gentle use
customer_reviews.author: Dennis A.

customer_reviews.title: Works great when doesn’t fall apart.
customer_reviews.text: I do love this juicers as we make our own lemon water, grapefruit juice & orange juice. The reason I gave it 4 stars is the spout detached from the base. I called Breville & was on hold for 20ish minutes. They are sending a replacement so that is another reason for 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Brown

customer_reviews.title: C Clips
customer_reviews.text: Vendor forgot to include the extra C clips. Called, no response. Emailed, no response. Amazon will not deal with it. The C Clip situation does not make sense for a $200 dollar item. The cup continues to fall out. I always buy Breville for all my kitchen appliances so I have been a good customer but I feel like they are burning me on this one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fresh orange juice readily available!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves fresh squeezed orange juice and this device has turned out to be the perfect Christmas gift for a man who "has everything he needs". He loves making his own juice, and I love the ease of squeezing big quantities of lemon, lime or oranges for pitchers of mojitos, margaritas and other beverages. Simple, efficient and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Marie Nishi

customer_reviews.title: good product.
customer_reviews.text: Used daily here in HI during citrus season. Far easier to use than other variants. Good extraction, although hard to vary pulp levels. Used on oranges, limes and grapefruit with similar results. Given the experience of others with the holding cup, I've tended to swipe it out while attached to the machine. That approach is hygienic and eems to work fine. Otherwise, cleanup is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie S

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money find an antique
customer_reviews.text: It's another darn Juicer know better than any of the others. It's not quieter, it's not more efficient, The peels fall off of it, And I doubt it will make it more than a year
customer_reviews.author: M. Kane

customer_reviews.title: Dome attachment will fail
customer_reviews.text: We love our other Breville products, however on this one their designer must have been asleep. It's weak point is the dome that come down on the fruit. It WILL fail and fall off in the middle of juicing. Made of cheap plastic. Falls off all the time! Otherwise machine would be OK.
customer_reviews.author: Etienne Berger

customer_reviews.title: Good look but with some deficiencies
customer_reviews.text: Good look but a few deficiencies, * The collection pan is not big enough. The juice from the top cover bowl would drip outside the pan and require extra cleaning. * The collection pan is not deep enough. You would have to press down quickly to avoid that the juice splashes out horizontally. Hard for kids not to make a mess. * The 1-yr warranty is not assuring at all compared to similar juicers. Use a credit card offering extended warranty or buy extra warranty. Also the metal appears too whitish to be a good grade of stainless steel. Looks more like aluminum alloy.
customer_reviews.author: Rearview

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Juice Today and Easy Too
customer_reviews.text: Years ago I bought this big contraption to juice fruits. I never used it and got rid of it a year later. I love the Breville Citrus Press. We have citrus trees in our yard and there is always so much waste. Now I can juice and freeze both orange and lemon juice. The machine was bigger than I expected but on first use was so easy. Clean up is a charm. No muss, no fuss, just a little pulp to put down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: KCinAZ

customer_reviews.title: Best Citrus Juicer
customer_reviews.text: SO EASY to juice a lot of citrus in just a few minutes...and it juices really well and very efficiently. But the most shining feature is the extreme ease of clean-up...it disassembles in a few seconds, rinses out very easily, and bam! back together. Honestly, this is the easiest-to-clean kitchen appliance I've ever owned. If you love fresh citrus juice, this is the must-have juicer for you...and very, very likely the last citrus juicer you will ever need. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: JayBeeRaleigh

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: this thing is awesome! only bad thing is the cap with the "eject" printed at the top that locks into the handle...was delivered damaged. but that has nothing to do with the actual product. works great! highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: chuckyi10

customer_reviews.title: BEST purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: This citrus juicer is just AMAZING. In Texas in the winter HEB has 10lb bags of oranges and I swear I make for myself 16oz freshly squeezed orange juice every morning, it takes me about 3 minutes to juice it and 30 seconds to clean it. The juicer is so quiet I make it when my kid is still sleeping in the bedroom next to the kitchen. This product is so sturdy it feels like it will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: One Year - Broken
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent juicer until it breaks. Which in my case was about one month after the warranty expired. It is well constructed of SS and it weighs like it should cost $200. i juice a lot of fruit on infrequent intervals. I got two sessions in. And on the third session it died after 10 oranges. Note to Breville, just because you can make it look and feel beautiful, it still needs to WORK for more than a year. I generally live by the rule that you get what you pay for. That is decidedly not the case here.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Hall

customer_reviews.title: Good machine could be designed better.
customer_reviews.text: Would have been much better had the top insert been made as a push turn and click into place than the way they made it to just push in. It falls out whole use and is extremely annoying. I did find though that if you set it up... put the fruit on like you are going to use it but without being plugged in and push hard it will click into place better. Had to push so hard I was afraid I would break it and now I’m afraid to remove it for fear it will not lock that good again. So I clean it as is. Other than that it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Allen Tedder

customer_reviews.title: Sucks for a so expensive product
customer_reviews.text: It worked for a year and broke! Sucks for a so expensive product. I live in Brazil and here does not have technical assistance.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a champ. I felt it was over priced but we have 5 Lemon trees and I needed something that gets the job done without a material that gets deterioted with the acid. This juicer gets the job done easily. Easy to clean. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: LSPayor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent citrus press! Easy to clean too!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent citrus press! Was researching for best options as I am raw vegan fruitarian and live my OJ every morning! This works well and very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Adam s.

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy Fresh Orange Juice and no pain in your hand
customer_reviews.text: I have carpal tunnel and this machine doesn’t hurt my hand. I can make orange juice for all the family pain free. Very stylish and very easy to use. Love it! I bough 2 more juicers already and give one to my sister.
customer_reviews.author: lilliaco

customer_reviews.title: I am disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Brenville Citrus Press that I have owned. The first one last only 4yrs before it just stopped working. The one I have now was bought less than two months ago and it is already starting to act up. Sometimes it simply will not start. When it starts it is okay. I live in The Bahamas so I do not have the luxury of shipping it back to the company. I will not buy another Brenville Citrus Press.
customer_reviews.author: Camille Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Solidly built and easy to use. Washes up quickly. We have been able to incorporate fresh citrus into our foods and smoothies in just a few seconds. Totally recommend - just a hefty price tag.
customer_reviews.author: JavaGirl

customer_reviews.title: Just received it...
customer_reviews.text: This Breville juicer looks excellent: modern, sturdy, shiny and with an intuitive shape that catches all the attention. It is very easy to operate and it came with the pressing arm already assembled. It is very quiet, fast, powerful and it does not move at all while in use. Very easy to wash and re-anssemble. The stainless steel is smudge proof. I really like it. Caveats: it does not handle extra large grapefruit, or pummelo : small oranges, lemons or limes get stuck in the pressing cup after releasing the pressing arm : is expensive. But again, I consider it to be the best in its category. I will follow-up in 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: vaio

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I use it several times per week- mostly for grapefruit but have used all other types of citrus. It’s well made, easy to clean, and permits me to have fresh juice regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Ohio nature lover

customer_reviews.title: Quick, quiet, and easy to use and to clean
customer_reviews.text: If you want to juice large quantities of oranges, you can’t go wrong with this juicer. Quick (7 seconds per half orange), quiet, and easy to clean, it makes short work of a chore that can wear out your wrist if done by hand. I can’t answer to its reliability, as we’ve had it for only a few weeks, but the Breville espresso machine at my work has stood up to a year and a half of use by an entire department.
customer_reviews.author: ray610

customer_reviews.title: hard to manage because of cheap metal base
customer_reviews.text: Works fine and is not loud. I was expecting a lot more quality for the price you have to pay. in the liquid base the metal is not finished and you can cut yourself while managing. I had cut myself 3 times.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Isabel Rivero

customer_reviews.title: A WONDERFUL CITRUS JUICER
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite appliances! I have had mine for more than 6 years. Never had a problem. The motor is strong, and I can juice dozens of grapefruit and oranges, as well as limes/lemons, very quickly. There is never a wait for fresh juice. This unit is very strong and sturdy. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyne

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy unless they improve the quality of the fruit dome
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I use it everyday since we purchased it three weeks ago. Most parts are great quality except for the fruit dome. This part unlocks and falls out all the time, it’s a real pain. Unless they change the quality of this part, I will not recommend buying it for the price when there are other cheaper options. I was willing to pay the higher price expecting higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Mejía

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing device, well machined/build and very durable. I use it to juice lime with the cup removed. I use this juicer frequently and I i must its the best juicer bar none.
customer_reviews.author: Cronusweb C.

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product!!!! Easy clean up easy assemble and easy to use!!! It is a must have!!!!
customer_reviews.author: SCBred

customer_reviews.title: Use everyday
customer_reviews.text: If I could do commercials or sell these I would!!!! So simple in every way!!!! My kids love it too.
customer_reviews.author: heatshar

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this citrus juicer!
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price. Quality construction, easy to use and clean. We have several citrus trees so it has gotten a lot if use already. I’ve juiced oranges, lemons, limes, tiny key limes and large mutant lemons. All sizes have worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great but it was put at the wrong address
customer_reviews.text: The product was amazing and did not have any problems. However the delivery person put it at the wrong address and next time please put more caution into delivering the product. Other then that I absolutely loved it and i will be using it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Ardon

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: The cap attaches to the handle using a friction mechanism and is prone to falling off pretty frequently. In all, the pluses outweigh the minuses, though. Unlike my extractor juicer, this is easy to clean up and makes fresh-squeezed OJ a reality without the mess. The handle make extracting the juice a lot easier as well as it applies extra torque where it's needed.
customer_reviews.author: GCU BBQ

customer_reviews.title: MALA CALIDAD. primer dia de uso y dejo de funcionar. Bad Quality, First day of use and stop working
customer_reviews.text: primer dia de uso, y luego de varias naranjas dejo de funcionar. It looks and work great, for the few minutes it worked. It stop. I was very excited, with my new juicer, but apparently it is not for heavy use, just a few orange maybe will be ok. But for a lot of orange it didn't. Too expensive to use for just a few orange.
customer_reviews.author: fave backpack

customer_reviews.title: It's a monster, easily the best juicer I've used.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace a heirloom juicer that was found to contain lead. Much larger than expected, be prepared to lose counter-space or cupboard space. Parts separate easily for cleaning, either by hand or dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: goukiman

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Wanter buy this product almost an year. Result Expensive product with cheap parts horrible plastic smell as soon as I opened. Second filer was missing
customer_reviews.author: SSV

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: One of the best appliances that I have purchased. Breville has never let me down, and most of my kitchen is their products. Really convenient to work with. Cleaning is easy. Look and finish is great. You feel the quality while using this. Juicing lemons and oranges is more fun than ever and I never buy lemon juice or orange juice anymore, just lemons and oranges. I have never had any problems with it so far during the 18 months that I've used it.
customer_reviews.author: Sina Hakami

customer_reviews.title: Sweet!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this juicer about 10 times now. Works great on lemons, oranges, and grapefruit. Makes quick work, especially if you're used to doing it by hand. Easy to clean, love it.
customer_reviews.author: GBean

customer_reviews.title: So worth it!
customer_reviews.text: We recently bought a property with an orange grove. There was no way my old handheld $10 machine was going to cut it. It was about 10 to 15 minutes plus a big mess just one cup of juice. Enter the beautiful Breville. It probably takes about one minute per cup of juice, is beautiful on the counter and so super easy to clean and use. My husband thought I was crazy wanting to buy such an expensive citrus juicer, and now he's asking if we should get another one for the other property. We are delighted with the purchase, it is beautiful solid and easy to use. We would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Hi

customer_reviews.title: Little juicer great power!
customer_reviews.text: Very Easy to clean and use the juicer. A little big of size. The juicer is absolutely awesome. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cristela

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Pros: Extracts the juice really well, Got a really heavy-build look Cons: The upper cup that holds down on the fruit and the way it connects to the arm is made of really cheap plastic
customer_reviews.author: Sooraj Ram

customer_reviews.title: Looks expensive
customer_reviews.text: Yes. It looks expensive. Because it made with Stainless Steel. That's all. Function, Features are all same as other cheap plastic items. It also has a problem with weak parts of the top press cover.
customer_reviews.author: ken kim

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome. My aunt wanted this for few months so ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. My aunt wanted this for few months so i got it for her birthday and she loves it-- She makes some of the best cocktails i have ever tasted and because we live in the same building i am the usual juice squeezer--sometimes 50 or more limes for big parties. I do hope the reliability and durability is not an issue but only time will tell. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: T Ham

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have had my Breville CPXL for a few months now. It is one of the best purchases I have made. It is so easy to use, easy to clean and very efficient. It fits perfectly under my kitchen counter top. I make fresh squeezed orange juice everyday for my family. You will never go back to store bought juice.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Alderman

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Good machine Unfortunately the plastic ring that has to hold the top is getting bad
customer_reviews.author: Vali

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This juice machine is not very good, two months ago I bought it and the lid always falls, and they no longer accept a refund for what is paid for the machine I think it should work better
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Use this alot
customer_reviews.text: Solid and durable after lots of use. Breville product hold up well for several items we own
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: love it, we've used this, well lost count already, easy to use, we'll be ordering another one soon as a gift 🎁
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Makes fresh lemonade in minutes. I've used it a few times and thus far I'm a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best citrus juicer ever!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this juicer. It was recommended to me from a friend who have been used it for almost 10 years and still work perfectly. Easy to use and durable.
customer_reviews.author: VANESSA DE LA BARCA

customer_reviews.title: Best Juicer I've Ever Used!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many juicers through the years, but I have to admit that the Breville 800CPXL is the best of all! It is sturdy; it is quiet; it comes apart easily to be cleaned; and it makes short work of getting juice, which is what a juicer is supposed to be all about! It is not a cheap machine, but then, you get what you pay for in life, so it is so worth it! I liked it so much, I had to buy a second one for our house in Calgary to take back with me, since I live in 2 places! I highly recommend this juicer!
customer_reviews.author: thatcrazydoglady

customer_reviews.title: This is the Best Citrus Juicer:)
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is the easiest and fastest. Absolutely no wrist action. Just put in one half of an orange and pull leaver. The price might scare you but it is well worth it. We feel very blessed to have found this.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Pardee-Jones

customer_reviews.title: Excellant!
customer_reviews.text: Love this piece of equipment! Wish I bought it earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Jonna H.

customer_reviews.title: Much quicker than old fashioned squeezers, or cheap plastic electric
customer_reviews.text: Just cut your citrus in half. After that it takes about 3 seconds to finish each. The three removable pieces rinse right off just as quickly. My favorite kitchen gadget right now.
customer_reviews.author: Lyonardo

customer_reviews.title: Notes....
customer_reviews.text: Goofie design with the "press down cup". Easy to take off (just press the eject button), but re-mounting is a pain.
customer_reviews.author: John Arnold

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: Ohhh my, it is the best press ever,gave it as a gift to my friends but tested out in Palm Springs where the citrus trees full of yummy fruits, fresh of the tree what can be better! Turn it on and it is just hummmmmming away and all the juice is coming out of any citrus fruit's, easy to clean, a joy every time u use it.If I would live in Palm Springs I would have this and only this press also. If the price goes down a little more I sure will get one. I hope u enjoy juicing the same way as I did. Looking forward for my own.
customer_reviews.author: G-Man

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved it while it worked. Didn't last past a summer of orange juicing.
customer_reviews.author: Susan DeValdivielso

customer_reviews.title: This has worked great for us
customer_reviews.text: This has worked great for us. We've used it to juice a couple trees full of fruit so far - lemon, orange, grapefruit, lime. WAY faster than doing this by hand, and extracts more juice.
customer_reviews.author: Kingpin

customer_reviews.title: The Cadillac of juicers
customer_reviews.text: I'm a frequent juicer -- not in great quantities, but I juice often. This juicer makes such convenient work of it. I think the keys are: stainless so it's easy to rinse and clean, and the juice tray. Unlike other models, this has a spout that directs the juice where ever you want: a glass if it's an orange, a small measuring cup if it's lemon or lime. And the tray isn't a bowl, so it is shallow, easy to rinse out and there's little fuss. You would think that such a large machine (it is heavy and big -- but attractive on the counter) would demand a lot of maintenance, but it doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: K. Berg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Citrus Press
customer_reviews.text: We have used a basic citrus juicer from Target for years, and it's fine for a few oranges or grapefruits. But, we needed something more powerful to press several pieces at a time. We tried a fancy Jack Lalane juicer that was overly complicated and an overkill. When we got the Breville it was "love at first press." The solid construction and simple design make this item a real winner. It's easy to operate and squeezes maximum juice out. The parts come apart easily to make cleaning a snap. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth and Rich

customer_reviews.title: Not Good
customer_reviews.text: This didn't even last us 2 months. Every time you push down the top now it won't spin to juice the citrus and we pretty much spent all this money for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Dow

customer_reviews.title: It works as advertised !
customer_reviews.text: Great citrus juicer. It’s not a restaurant machine but the most important part is durability and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Marino Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Efficient
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t sure if this citrus press for to some negative reviews. This is very efficient and doesn’t leave anything left. All juice extracted. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: D. Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, easy to clean and rarely clogs with pulp.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, quiet and efficient. Makes excellent orange juice. Squeezed 20 large naval oranges in less than ten minutes. Easy to clean and rarely clogs with pulp.
customer_reviews.author: Poz

customer_reviews.title: The best  Citrus squeezing invention !
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how I ever lived without this machine. It is very durable, so easy to use and clean. You do not have to put much pressure on the handle when squeezing your fruit .
customer_reviews.author: Eddie & Jeanne Silva

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer.
customer_reviews.text: Love this juicer! After burning through 3 different less expensive ones, this juicer is the best. Should have spent the money up front before burning out 3 $35 ones. We make fresh juice every day, this is great, juices well, cleanly, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: SteveG

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: We have trees of lemons, limes, friends give us pomegranates and oranges. How did I ever live without this thing? I love it, it does what it is supposed to, it's easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia4

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: great for oranges and limes - lemons with 'knobby ends" can spin in the holder and not press as well (solve by cutting in half sideways instead of vertically) well made - HEAVY - occasionally needs some encouragement to start spinning if you lower handle very gently once you get used to its minor foibles, it's a wonderful machine, although one you won't want to lift on and off the countertop if you have the space to leave it out
customer_reviews.author: John B. Day

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: This citrus juicer is without a doubt THE BEST. I live in Florida and have a few citrus trees. This machine juices everything from small limes to enormous grapefruit. Until now I used a commercial juicer, but with age arthritis made this impossibl for me to use. This machine will juice all the fruit from one tree without complaining once. It is unbelievable efficient, easy and easy to clean. Everyone should have one. Even a child could juice his own morning juice.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybyrd

customer_reviews.title: Best juicer.
customer_reviews.text: This is hands-down the best juicer I've ever seen or owned. Sister-in-law had one and we had to get one too.
customer_reviews.author: Children's Advocate

customer_reviews.title: Breville 800CPXL do not buy this crap
customer_reviews.text: got very hot stop working after 2-3 minute of using .. uhh burned rubber smell.. another Amazon b/s product just to sell and make money
customer_reviews.author: Jamlockers

customer_reviews.title: Not sure.... I received a used one for the price of a new one!
customer_reviews.text: My juicer arrived lightning fast, however, it was clear immediately that it had been opened and handled before, possibly even used. The item didn't fit in the packaging. The box didn't close all the way. I didn't even take it out because I could see it had been handled. I don't want a used item. That's why I bought a new one. Or so I thought. Going back.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! We have been using it daily for almost 6 months. Super easy to clean and a breeze to use. Juices oranges, tangerines and even lemons. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Vedika jiandani

customer_reviews.title: Very good product but pricey compared to others.
customer_reviews.text: Criticisms: pour spout leaves only room for smaller containers, cap on press bar does not easily handle oversized grapefruit. Likes: quiet, powerful operation. Ease of cleaning. Solid structure.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I will never in my life squeeze another orange, lemon or grapefruit, I love this product, the quality is excellent, works great and it’s an easy clean.
customer_reviews.author: Nikesha sherwood

customer_reviews.title: Top quality product
customer_reviews.text: Top quality materials used. Strong motor. Gets 100% of the juice. easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Juicer!
customer_reviews.text: Love this juicer. It's quiet, sturdy, easy to clean up and really does an excellent job of juicing the citrus. Followed the directions for lemons where they tell you to cut off the knobby tip and it works very well. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CARJES

customer_reviews.title: Why I like it?
customer_reviews.text: This is the best I've ever used to juice limes. I process hundreds at a time and I store the juice in ziplock bags, then freeze them. And I'm all set for the year. My Breville stays parked in the basement until I am ready to squeeze another 200 the next summer! Breville squeezes everything out of he fruit, including the pulp (the best in the juice) so that there is no waste. I barely put some weight on the handle and Breville does the whole job!
customer_reviews.author: karen chervier

customer_reviews.title: Your machine is as strong as it’s weakest component
customer_reviews.text: The plastic part that holds the head of the machine is weak and won’t hold the head on after few use. It’s sitting in the cabinet collecting dust.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after just one use
customer_reviews.text: After one use, (juicing a large quantity of meyer lemons), the hinge on the arm got loose & now the arm's stuck in the down position. We don't have the tools to fix it and aren't willing to keep a product that requires a repair after one use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: I have never owned a juicer as good as this.
customer_reviews.author: dot

customer_reviews.title: The beginning of my Breville love affair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to juice the hundreds of pomegranates I harvest each autumn (about 15-20 gallons worth). I've used it two harvest seasons now and am happy to report it has exceeded my expectations. I get more juice out of every fruit than from any other juicer I've tried, with less fatigue and greater speed. Juicing pomegranates is still a messy proposition that no appliance can solve, this one included. Fortunately the die-cast surface cleans easily. Wish I could say the same for my clothes and my sink! I like the looks and performance so much that I've started to replace my other kitchen appliances with those made by Breville. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: RMT

customer_reviews.title: A bit annoying! But juices well otherwise.
customer_reviews.text: The attachment that is meant to clip in and clip out is rather annoying as it keeps falling out while juicing.
customer_reviews.author: Moyra Mulholland

customer_reviews.title: Awesome juicer. A must for all the summertime refreshing ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome juicer. A must for all the summertime refreshing drinks. Perfectly juices small limes all the way up to huge grapefruits. Very well made and super easy to clean. We've been using on our patio to make summer drinks. It's amazingly fast and we use it often. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Clarke

customer_reviews.title: fast, fresh orange juice
customer_reviews.text: my friend has this item and we decided to buy one too. it is fast and so easy to use. cut the fruit in half, push down on the handle, and you have juice. It is easy to clean as well. Just take the easily removable parts to the sink and wash them. I am so glad we bought it. Much cheaper then buying juice from the store. Fresh is best. Just need to have good oranges and lemons to use for the right flavor. I highly recommend it for the person who just wants basic juice!
customer_reviews.author: Geri

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, been using it since 2 months, it squeezes out all the juice from orange. I am happy with my purchase. I used manual hand press citrus juicer but it was not able to squeeze all the juice out. Very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: When you see Breville you can feel good about the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Nicely built, great price and easy to use. If you have a pressing job this product will assist you in taking care of it. Oranges? Grapefruit or other fruits are taken care of with ease. Easy to use, clean and it is reliable. When given a choice for any kitchen chore this device will take care of the issue. All parts clean well and assemble with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Charles McMullen

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service is great!
customer_reviews.text: I read that Breville's customer service was not good, so I hesitated to call them today. But they were wonderful! I have used this citrus press for four years and I love it. But it is only working sporatically now. If the small part they suggested does not fix the problem ($1, and free shipping), the next step is to ship it back to them for servicing. This is the first review I have ever written, but I wanted to correct the misperception that the customer service was poor. It certainly is not as far as I'm concerned.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer
customer_reviews.text: I just got mine today and I love it. It’s easy to assemble and disassembled. Easy to clean. It efficiently makes orange juice with very little pulp. I recommend it to anyone looking to buy a juicer.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Wright

customer_reviews.title: Breville rocks! Tired of plastic junk that breaks?
customer_reviews.text: We have had a number of friends buy this after seeing it in our home. This machine is the second Breville we have -- we also have the vegetable juicer -- both are top quality and built to last. Absolutely could not be happier -- we live in Florida and buy oranges by the case direct from the packing plant. Plus we have two trees of our own. We use this every day.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Breville 800CPXL Juicer! ***THE BEST***
customer_reviews.text: This is the mother of all home/semi-commercial juicers. It only does citrus but it does it amazingly well. Zero effort (just a little patience) to get through juicing 5-6 oranges for refreshing juice. The parts are high quality, the weight solid on your counter. The only thing to be watchful of is the plastic top piece which presses down on the citrus...go easy with that piece and do NOT remove it after every use to clean. It will eventually fall off if you do. One hell of a juicer!
customer_reviews.author: Doc Patel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: My mother inlaw has the cheaper one. I got this one so I can compare the two, and I have to say it is well worth the extra money for the upgraded stainless steel one. You will absolutely love yours as I do! Amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

product_meta.title: Breville 800CPXL Die-Cast Stainless-Steel Motorized Citrus Press
product_meta.description:
Professional-Style Juicer for your own Countertop.

Breville's commercial-style citrus press is wonderfully functional and excellently designed. It has a die-cast stainless steel juicing cone that will fit all size citrus fruits. It boasts innovative juicing action for maximum juice extraction. It also has two stainless steel filters for variable pulp control. It will enhance any kitchen countertop.

Breville 800CPXL Die-Cast Motorized Citrus Press: 

 * Powerful citrus press housed in professional-grade brushed stainless steel.
 * Industrial strength, whisper-quiet motor.
 * Revolutionary active-arm system.
 * One-size-fits-all juicing cone provides maximum juice extraction.
 * Drip-stop juice spout.

Dimensions: Measures 11 x 9 x 18 inches

A Closer Look: It also has 2 filters for variable pulp, a dust cover and cord storage. Voltage: 110 - 120 Volts.Take Care: Dishwasher-safe parts.


Made in the USA.
feature_bullets: Powerful citrus press housed in professional-grade brushed stainless steel
Industrial strength, whisper-quiet motor; revolutionary active-arm system
1-size-fits-all juicing cone provides maximum juice extraction; drip-stop juice spout
1 coarse stainless steel filter; cord storage; dishwasher-safe parts
